explains: v. 做临时工作；做临时工作

sentences.en: She began working for the company as a temp.
sentences.cn: 她开始在这家公司做临时雇员。

sentences.en: Many temp agencies offer word processing courses to those with rusty office skills.
sentences.cn: 许多临时工中介机构为那些办公技能不熟练的人开设文字处理课程。

sentences.en: Don't let the "temp" scare you, though.
sentences.cn: 但是，不要让“临时工”这个词吓跑了你。
